section.title: Description
section.p: The act of accepting the role of fulfiller. This is the act of accepting a prosthetic request. The ProthetictPromise act identifies a fulfiller promise for a prosteitic transaction.

stentry.p: The date that a transaction was entered to a system. It may be the date the transaction was initiated.
The date that the order was closed.
A textual representation of the nature and characteristics of the item.
A unique identifier for the Act (HL7 3.0)

Identifies the paper form on which the transaction is tracked. Possible values include: PSC, 2237, 2421, 2431, 2474, 2520, 2529-3, 2529-7, 2914, Inventory Issue, Lab Issue-3, Stock Issue, Visa, Other.
Information pertinent to the issued for the patient.
The station to which the prosthetic transaction is assigned. The station is responsible for the issue and payment for the prosthetic device.
An interaction between a patient and a practitioner under the auspices of a given organization for the purpose of providing healthcare-related service(s).
